title: Drawing, "Design for Woven Textile:  "Toll""
inscribed: Inscribed in black marking pen, lower right:  TOLL
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: Abstract design or organic/bird-like shapes with an eye at upper right on vertically stripped colored background.
